title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Visualizing Conceptual Database Modeling Based on the TSSL Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic database structures and ERD elements
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately create a database schema diagram with three or more layers by applying syntactic-level transition principles of the TSSL model.
Learners can reduce inter-layer transition errors in conceptual modeling by over 80% using visual mapping techniques.
Learners can derive normalized relational schemas applicable to real-world work scenarios through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
